description:
Colten is a straight guy from LA who I think used to do a bit of acting.
He was pretty nervous (and a bit sunburned), and I had asked him to grow his body hair out. Typically, he thought his hair HAD grown completely out.
He seemed a bit too focused on the porn and so he was a little challenging to get him to play with you, the audience.
Not a bad solo by any means, but when I edited the video, I thought it would fit nicely in a marathon of video releases!
title: Colten - Solo
